thread.title: Watch: Man arrested after dancing on burning home
thread.title_full: Watch: Man arrested after dancing on burning home | OregonLive.com

author: The Associated Press
title: Watch: Man arrested after dancing on burning home
text:
Indianapolis police arrested a man after he barricaded himself inside a home and then danced on the roof as it burned.
WRTV reports that officers with the Indianapolis Metropolitan Police Department responded to a call about a man barricading himself inside a home Monday.
The man climbed on the roof, but retreated back inside after officers fired rubber bullet at him.
The fire department responded after smoke was seen coming from the home.
The man came back out on the roof and started dancing as smoke and flames billowed out from the home.
Police tased him and took him into custody.
--The Associated Press
